statements: DELETE FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_city = 'New York' AND patient_age > 30;
DELETE FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' AND patient_age > 30;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' AND ethnicity = 'Asian';
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 1000 AND treatment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_status = 'Pending' AND diagnosis_date > '2021-06-01';
DELETE FROM patient_conditions WHERE patient_id = 102 AND condition_name = 'Diabetes';
